pkgmetadata.longdescription: # YoLink Python library for HA Integration## Supported devices* YS6602/4 YS6704 (outlet | plug)* YS7103/4/5 (siren)* YS7704/7705/7706 (door sensor)* YS7707 (Contact Sensor)* YS7804/5 (motion sensor)* YS7903/4 (leak sensor)* YS8003/4/5/6 (temperature/humidity sensor)* YS7201 (vibration sensor)* YS7606/7 (lock)* YS4909 YS5001 (valve controller)* YS5705/6 (switch)* YS7A01/2 (CO & Smoke Sensor)* YS4002/3 (Thermostat)* YS4906/8 (Garage Door Sensor/ Garage Door Controller)* YS5707 (Dimmer)* YS6801/2 (MultiOutlet)* YS3604 (FlexFob)* YS7106 (Power Failure Alarm)
